item.title: About
item.description: cyber@CIT is the official cybersecurity club from the University of New Haven and Connecticut Institute of Technology.

item.title: Join the Club
item.description: Fall 2025 Meetings: Wednesdays 6:30-7:30 PM in Maxcy 218

item.title: Resources
item.description: General # TryHackMe — cybersecurity platform focused on guided learning OverTheWire — linear-style challenges Red Team # HackTheBox — cloud-hosted vulnerable machines to hack VulnHub — vulnerable machines for self-hosting on VirtualBox or VMWare OffSec Proving Grounds — three hours free per day of pentesting labs (or pay) Blue Team # LetsDefend — blue team training CTFs # PicoCTF — retired CTF challenges in every common CTF category pwn.

item.title: Team
item.description: The cyber@CIT hacking team competes in both red and blue team competitions that provide students with hands-on experience in real-world cyber operations.
